subject: SHOP QUESTION
description_text:
I live in Germany and wanted to ask if I will incur additional costs such
as customs and taxes

conversations.body_text: Hi Ebu Tosun,        No need, we shall dispatch your order from our German warehouse.

Hello,

How long will shipping take? They say it's shipped from Germany, but the
shop page says 9 to 15 days when I order.

Best regards


service@simsonn.com

Hello,

If something is defective, do I have to send it back to China, and if so,
do I have to pay for it? And how long would that take?


General and sales enquiries

Hello, how long is the shipping to germany?

General and sales enquiries
Hi Ebu Tosun,  In most cases, the issue can be resolved by sending replacement parts, so there’s no need to worry.

Hello, how long is the shipping to germany?


service@simsonn.com
